title: Alfresco Summit in London
text:
Join us in London on 7-9 of October. Look at our schedule - you can participate only presentations delivered by bees during all Summit!

We are going to drink some beer at October, 9th. Join us at http://bit.ly/1pBr5CQ to see details and to let us know that you are in!

title: Spanish National Library Success Story
text: We published the first success story! Ana Carrillo Pozas, Head of Document Management and Intranet of Spanish National Library, told us about their successes and failures during the Alfresco project implementation.

title: Alfresco Summit in San Francisco
text: Join us in San Francisco on 23-25 of September. Many bees give presentations and participate in this event. Look at our schedule - bees deliver more than 10 presentations! Contact other bees using Gihub Issues or our Mailing list to schedule a beer party during Summit.

title: Order your bee T-Shirt
text: Now you can order an official Order of the Bee T-shirt. Take an image from Github and print an image on black or white T-shirt using some t-shirt printing service.
